title: For a financially strong, sovereign and responsible Switzerland (Bitcoin Initiative)
wording: The National Bank holds gold reserves. Bitcoin should now also be included in the constitution as a strategic reserve asset — for a strong and independent Switzerland.

title: Strong society and economy thanks to parental leave (Family time initiative)
wording: On parental leave and equality, Switzerland lags far behind. In hardly any other country do parents receive so little time at the birth of their children. That must change!

title: For GMO-free food (Food protection initiative)
wording: The majority of the population wants GMO-free food. The initiative calls for strict rules to protect people, animals and the environment.

title: For people-oriented politics (No Lobbying)
wording: The No-Lobbying initiative prevents members of parliament in committees from deciding on their own lobbying mandates — so that parliament once again represents the citizens instead of the lobby.

title: Referendum against the Federal Act on Individual Taxation
comitee: Cross-party Committee 'Tax Fraud No', Committee 'Families against Individual Taxation', Federal Democratic Union (EDU)
wording: The referendum demands that the Federal Act on Individual Taxation, passed on June 20, 2025, be submitted to a popular vote.
